Title: Cryptographic Failures Lab – Leaking the Vault
Description: Welcome to EvilCorp’s legacy crypto lab. This system was built with outdated encryption, poor JWT practices, and predictable secrets. Explore how subtle cryptographic missteps can expose the entire infrastructure. Start your attack by browsing to `http://lab3.evilcorp.local` and logging in. Use `docker exec -it attacker-box bash` to enter your Kali environment for deeper analysis and cracking.

Challenges.Title: Step 1: Crack the Password
Challenges.Description: A weakly hashed password guards the door.

Challenges.Title: Step 2: Decode the Vault Key
Challenges.Description: That base64 message might be a clue...

Challenges.Title: Step 3: Find the Hardcoded Key
Challenges.Description: A buried config holds shared secrets.

Challenges.Title: Step 5: Confuse the Key Type
Challenges.Description: HMAC vs RSA? A classic mistake.

Challenges.Title: Step 7: Crack Thanos
Challenges.Description: Break into the host system via leaked backup.
